How do I list the first 10 transactions in the system using the `verus` command?

The `verus listtransactions` command actually lists the most recent 10 transactions in the system, not the first 10. If you want to list transactions 100 to 120, you can use `verus listtransactions "*" 20 100`.

Examples:

List the most recent 10 transactions in the systems
> verus listtransactions

List transactions 100 to 120
> verus listtransactions "*" 20 100

As a json rpc call
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listtransactions", "params": ["*", 20, 100] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
